title: LF D3+ Support
body:
**Ambition** is looking for a D3+ support main with knowledge in the below mentioned areas of the game:

- Knowledge on most lane match ups & play styles.
- Ability to implement game plans
- Able to communicate with ADC & sort out arguments without fighting.
- More will be required but these are just some of them

Support coach will be able to help you develop these areas but you must have the bast structure to enable that.

Please contact 'ReformedUser' ingame to discuss.
